lecture.title: Before we start
lecture.author: Ali Heydari
lecture.content:
Hi all!

Before I begin, I would like to thank you for your trust and kindness. Classes will be held online in Teams, and lessons are practical. The class link has been placed for participation. Please request through the link before the start of the class to open access for you.

Join Teams channel

Also, If you have no GitHub account, please create a new account and join the open-source world!

It is recommended that you install the Git software and another prerequisite:

  1. VS Code
  2. Git kraken
  3. Git - download install guide
